equipmentProcessingDescription: Set equipment as validated or return to draft for the supplier to make further changes. The Set/Return button will only apply to the visible rows. Use the site name filter and/or paging to assist.
gridDescription: Add new FSE, submit draft or updated FSE to government for validation, or decommission FSE to remove from future compliance reports. Select buttons will only select FSE displayed on current page. Increase page size and/or use filters to assist bulk processing.
title: Manage charging sites
description: Create new charging site locations where you want to add FSE. Charging sites must be created before adding FSE.
templateDescriptor: Download the charging-site template and upload the completed template to add multiple charging sites at once.
noChargingEquipmentsFnd: No charging equipments found at the selected site

documents.uploadTitle: Upload supporting documents for charging site
documents.documentLabel: Supporting documents help provide additional context and evidence for this charging site.

setToDecommissionConfirmTxt: This will set the selected FSE to Decommissioned status. They will no longer be available in future compliance reports. Do you want to proceed?
setSelectedAsSubmittedConfirmTxt: This will set the selected FSE to Submitted status. No more edits will be possible. Do you want to proceed?
